snippet: Two police officers stopped a deli robbery in progress in Bedford-Stuyvesant, and the crooks' attempt at escape through a bathroom to nowhere was documented by security cameras.
abstract: Two police officers stopped a deli robbery in progress in Bedford-Stuyvesant, and the crooks' attempt at escape through a bathroom to nowhere was documented by security cameras.

byline.original: By ANDY NEWMAN and WENDY RUDERMAN

headline.main: Robbers Caught on Video, and by Police, at Brooklyn Deli
